properties.name: attachmentName
properties.description: Resource name of the attachment, in the form "spaces/*/messages/*/attachments/*"

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Gets the metadata of a message attachment. The attachment data is fetched using the media API.

properties.name: jsonNotice
properties.displayName: See Google Chat Guide To Webhooks

properties.name: jsonParameters
properties.description: Whether to pass the message object as JSON

properties.name: messageJson
properties.description: Message input as JSON Object or JSON String

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Thread identifier which groups messages into a single thread. Has no effect if thread field, corresponding to an existing thread, is set in message. Example: spaces/AAAAMpdlehY/threads/MZ8fXhZXGkk.

properties.name: resourceName
properties.description: Name of the media that is being downloaded

properties.name: Get Many
properties.description: Get many memberships in a space

properties.name: spaceId
properties.description: Space resource name, in the form "spaces/*". Example: spaces/AAAAMpdlehY. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: requestId
properties.description: A unique request ID for this message. If a message has already been created in the space with this request ID, the subsequent request will return the existing message and no new message will be created.

properties.name: messageId
properties.description: Resource name of the message to be deleted, in the form "spaces//messages/"

properties.name: updateFieldsUi
properties.description: Rich, formatted and interactive cards that can be used to display UI elements such as: formatted texts, buttons, clickable images

properties.name: updateFieldsJson
properties.description: Message input as JSON Object or JSON String
